embedding.apiKey.label: API Key
embedding.apiKey.help: API key for the embedding provider (or use ${OPENAI_API_KEY})

embedding.model.label: Embedding Model
embedding.model.help: Embedding model name. Any OpenAI-compatible model is supported.

embedding.baseUrl.label: Base URL
embedding.baseUrl.help: Custom endpoint for OpenAI-compatible APIs (Ollama, LM Studio, vLLM, etc.)

embedding.dimensions.label: Vector Dimensions
embedding.dimensions.help: Override vector dimensions for custom models not in the built-in list

autoCapture.label: Auto-Capture
autoCapture.help: Automatically capture important information from conversations

autoRecall.label: Auto-Recall
autoRecall.help: Automatically inject relevant memories into context

captureMaxChars.label: Capture Max Chars
captureMaxChars.help: Maximum message length eligible for auto-capture

model.description: Embedding model name. Defaults to text-embedding-3-small. Any OpenAI-compatible model is supported.

baseUrl.description: Custom base URL for OpenAI-compatible embedding APIs (e.g. http://localhost:11434/v1 for Ollama)

dimensions.description: Vector dimensions for custom models not in the built-in list
